text: allah marganlo nimagnulaina karananga (tama jivanopadhi koraku) bhumilo tirige avakasam leka lemiki guri ayye pedavaru (dhanasahayaniki ar'hulu). Erugani manisi vari adagaka povatanni cusi, varu dhanavantulani bhavincavaccu! (Kani) vari mukha cihnalu cusi nivu varini gurtincagalavu. Varu prajalanu pattubatti adigevaru karu. Mariyu miru manci koraku emi kharcucesina adi allah ku tappaka telustundi
